behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Welcome. To the painted world of Ariandel.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text:
I am Friede.
I have long stood beside our blessed Father,
and the rest of the Forlorn.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: But Forlorn thou seemeth not.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text:
Ashen One,
I know not the missteps which led thee to this Painted World.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: But thy duty is all, and thy duty lieth elsewhere.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Return from whence thou cam'st.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: I presume it visible to thee? The bonfire here, in this room.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: A meek and faded thing, but 'twill guide thee nonetheless.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Ahh yes, there is a thing thou shouldst by rights possess.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text:
Ours is a chance encounter,
to be sure, but perhaps it was meant to be.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text:
Let this be a remembrance of this cold world,
a thing to help thee bear thy duty.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Now, return from whence thou cam'st.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Thou'st a place in that world, and that alone is cause to rejoice.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time reaching the Corvian Settlement
subdialogue_text: Be forewarned, eager Ash.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time reaching the Corvian Settlement
subdialogue_text: Should this world wither and rot,

behavior: #0Talk-1st time reaching the Corvian Settlement
subdialogue_text: even then would Ariandel remain our home.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time reaching the Corvian Settlement
subdialogue_text: Leave us be, Ashen One.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time reaching the Corvian Settlement
subdialogue_text:
Sweep all thought of us from thy mind.
As thy kind always have.
